cause.description:
Stop the insanity of a Coal-burning power plant in Midland. We do NOT need more pollution in our air and water. There is a wealth of information about the dangers of coal-burning, and NONE of them are safe. There is NO such thing as "clean coal". The ultra-fine nano particles defeat ALL industrial filters and human barriers. They carry mercury and arsenic directly through our lungs, into our blood and pass the blood-brain barrier
INFORMATION ON HOW TO HELP: www.midlandcares.org

Need for a new plant based on the Michigan 21st Century Energy Plan which assumed minimal efficiency and renewable energy efforts
There are results from other states indicating an efficiency program can replace the need for a new coal plant at less than half the cost (financial and especially, environmental)
Renewable energy is a fast growing source of electricity with wind farms being constructed in the Thumb and solar production in Hemlock
A coal plant is paid for by ratepayers in monthly bills. Efficiency and renewable energy can reduce electric bills

Renewable Energy and Renewable Energy Programs Create More Jobs than Coal Plants
The Midland coal plant is projected to create only 100 jobs after construction. However, over 19,000 additional jobs can be created in Michigan and probably many in the Midland area by renewable energy and energy efficiency programs. www.michigan.gov/gov/0,1607,7-168--166821--,00.html

Health
A Lansing plant half the size of new Midland plant emits over 2 million pounds of toxic pollution a year including 500 pounds of airborne lead and 100 pounds of mercury
